column3: â€œGreat for people with Anxiety disorders.  I felt super happy and uplifted immediately and had zero paranoia or anxiety issues. in fact I went for a nice October cruise with the music up and Windows down.  great strainâ€

â€œThis is my go-to strain for sleep.  Relaxing effects are immediate; I feel very mellow & happy & buzzed.  Then after about 5 min, the body high kicks in.  My muscles relax and I'm ready for sleep.  I get a good refreshing night of sleep and wake up restored and rested, which is an amazing result for me since I have fibromyalgia.  

Without weed, I used to have troubles falling to sleep, would wake up several times in...â€

â€œ100 star's if I could give em. Screw it, 100 star's!!!!!! It's that good. I live in Medford Or and it's very easy to find. Probably the best next to Fruity Pebbles that I have ever consumed. I am growing some now hydroponicly and I can't wait till October!!!!!â€

â€œI'm a kush fan, but oh, my, my.. If your Marionberry Kush is grown and cured properly, as is the batch I got from  farm called green hills. this high is amazing! I would call it the Matthew Mconahigh" I feel alright
column5: alright. i read a lot of this strains reviews before writing mine.

column1: Not only do I agree with 85% of them. but I would like to add.. this senile euphoria will hulk smash your anxiety it's relaxi...â€"

column3: â€œLong term for me, more heady relaxed then body relaxed. Wasn't super knockout, but did make tired. Decent.â€

â€œMarionberry seizes your attention with an inviting surprise of relaxation. Within minutes you're stuck wondering how this could be your favorite bud almost without contestation. The earthy berry notes give the olfactory joy you'd expect of such a hybrid, along with the acute sensation of flying - soaring clearly through each thought. The physiological effect is outstanding, making you feel weightless yet grounded, an...â€

â€œWas very impressed with this strain. It delivers in every aspect. I grew out of those heavy couch lock strains many many years ago! Us more vintage folk like to keep it heady and vertical, and Marion Berry is one of those strains that hits all my pleasure points at once! And zero anxiety, no pounding heart no sweats, just pure eurphoic bliss, its a pretty rounded strain,great bag appeal, the Raspberry pheno smells li...â€
â€œI really love this strain.  It definitely helps me to relax and can help me to rest and sleep.  It has helped me with anxiety also.â€

â€œI feel pretty blasÃ© about this strain. The high was mellow, but it didn't last very long. The buds are super sticky, and the smell before burning isn't the greatest in my opinion (earthy, decayed berries). I'd smoke this if it was offered, but I'll never pay money for this again.â€

â€œMarionberry not Marion Berry the crack smoking ex D.C. Mayor. Those of us in the NW know the difference. Tasty berry kush that I got from Sasquatch Farms. Great taste, decent high, good looking colorful bud. 7.5/10â€
â€œJust that first hit and I can feel my head clear up ğŸ˜â€
â€œReminds me of sunshine and summer berries and fruit.  Happy, smiley, relaxing strain for me. I liked the sweetness.â€

â€œExcellent berry/citrus flavor, a touch on the savory side.  This strain is excellent for bringing out the artist in you. Every time I enjoy MBK I turn into Picasso trying to draw everything around me. I imagine this would be a great strain for songwriters. One of my favorite strains.  Careful though, too much will certainly put you to sleep.â€
â€œBOMB!!!â€

â€œA good strain because of the kush and romulan qualities. Not my favorite strain but definately worth consuming. The high is mild with a medium stone. Much more functional than GDP or Conspiracy Kush. Not too indica heavy but surely stoney. Sweet, tangy, berry, gummy, and earthy.â€
â€œIt's just like the description. Good lazy watch a movie and let it relax the bones while still able to functionâ€
â€œGreat Product !! Keeps me going throughout the dayâ€
â€œExcellent strain full of terps and flavor. Excellent indica-dominant hybrid for the day to relieve anxiety and great for social events.â€

the taste is there...

â€œUplifted me a lot, became super friendly and happy for almost 3 hours. Best weed for social interaction among all weed that I tried.â€

â€œTotally fantastic - inspired me to write this my first Leafly review. Such a pleasant relaxed body high along with a clear and calm mind. Good for getting creative juices flowing and chill cerebral activities, like reading. Made prolonged focus while reading feel easier for my sometimes hyper mind. Not too sleepy. Also felt a slight appetite suppressant effect. Smells like summer. My guess is, you'll like it ;)â€

â€œWhat a delicious strain. This hybrid has a fruity aroma and is an easy strain to smoke or vape.

Just an all around yummy high.â€
